elements.description: `` is a badge that displays a color as a rectangle with a specified height and width. The transparency of the color will be displayed. It can slot elements and they are automatically centered. Because of using a canvas to draw the color, it needs to be explicitly sized via the width- and height-attribute. ```html [[color]] ``` Custom property | Description | Default ----------------|-------------|---------- `--transparency-pattern` | background pattern for the transparency layer | linear-gradient(45deg, rgba(0,0,0,0.15) 25%, transparent 25%, transparent 75%, rgba(0,0,0,0.15) 75%, rgba(0,0,0,0.15)), linear-gradient(45deg, rgba(0,0,0,0.15) 25%, transparent 25%, transparent 75%, rgba(0,0,0,0.15) 75%, rgba(0,0,0,0.15))) `--transparency-pattern-size` | size transparency pattern | 12px `--color-badge-radius` | border-radius of the badge | 6px `--color-badge-shadow` | box-shadow of the badge | 0 1px 4px 1px rgba(0,0,0,.1) `--color-badge-slot` | mixin applied to the slot of the badge | {}

properties.name: hslPrecision
properties.description: Precision of hsl-values, if the format is 'hsl' (for saturation and lightness it is applied according to their percentage value)

properties.name: width
properties.description: width of the badge in pixels

properties.name: height
properties.description: height of the badge in pixels

elements.name: ColorBadge

attributes.name: hsl-precision

attributes.name: height

elements.description:
`<color-text-input>` adds a color input to your page using Polymer.

  ```html
    <color-text-input value="{{color}}"></color-text-input>
  ```


The following custom properties and mixins are also available for styling:

Custom property | Description | Default
----------------|-------------|----------
Custom property | Description | Default
----------------|-------------|----------
`--transparency-pattern` | background pattern for the transparency layer | linear-gradient(45deg, rgba(0,0,0,0.15) 25%, transparent 25%, transparent 75%, rgba(0,0,0,0.15) 75%, rgba(0,0,0,0.15)), linear-gradient(45deg, rgba(0,0,0,0.15) 25%, transparent 25%, transparent 75%, rgba(0,0,0,0.15) 75%, rgba(0,0,0,0.15)))
`--transparency-pattern-size` | size transparency pattern | 12px
`--color-badge-radius` | border-radius of the badge | 3px
`--color-badge-shadow` | box-shadow of the badge | 0 1px 4px 1px rgba(0,0,0,.1)

properties.name: hslPrecision
properties.description: Precision of hsl-values, if the format is 'hsl' (for saturation and lightness it is applied according to their percentage value)

properties.name: width
properties.description: width of the badge in pixels

properties.name: height
properties.description: height of the badge in pixels

properties.name: _valueIsSet
properties.description: is true when the value is not undefined

methods.name: _attachDom
methods.description: attach dom with `delegatesFocus: true` so that the element is also focussed while its's children are too, and to autofocus to first tabable

elements.description:
`<color-input>` adds a color input to your page using Polymer.

  ```html
    <color-input value="{{color}}"></color-input>
  ```


The following custom properties and mixins are also available for styling:

Custom property | Description | Default
----------------|-------------|----------
Custom property | Description | Default
----------------|-------------|----------
`--transparency-pattern` | background pattern for the transparency layer | linear-gradient(45deg, rgba(0,0,0,0.15) 25%, transparent 25%, transparent 75%, rgba(0,0,0,0.15) 75%, rgba(0,0,0,0.15)), linear-gradient(45deg, rgba(0,0,0,0.15) 25%, transparent 25%, transparent 75%, rgba(0,0,0,0.15) 75%, rgba(0,0,0,0.15)))
`--transparency-pattern-size` | size transparency pattern | 12px
`--color-badge-radius` | border-radius of the badge | 3px
`--color-badge-shadow` | box-shadow of the badge | 0 1px 4px 1px rgba(0,0,0,.1)
